target: Very funny word! But I guess not to them. It is a popular activity overall and has great health benefits.
context: <user>  hello. i like to hike and wish i could do more hiking <system> I also enjoy hiking! Especially through trails in the countryside. <user> same here, i have a place i go in the country and hike <system> Have you ever been on a day hike, where you hike for the entire day? <user> never hiked for a whole day just about for an hour or so <system> In New Zealand they sometimes go for a long, vigorous walk and they call it "tramping". <user> funny word to call it, i wonder how long do they tramp <system>
